title: Light the empty places
creator_credit: Crawford-Senior Film Productions and Andrew Swanson
brief_description: A retired school teacher recounts his schooling, teacher training and teaching experiences in various schools with re-enacted sequences. This is followed by a survey of contemporary school facilities and specialised education services in Victoria. Features the Horsham High School Choir. Celebrates a centenary of State education in Victoria 1873-1973.
